About Me

I am currently a Lecturer in Computer Science at the School of Science & Technology, Nottingham Trent University. Before, I worked as a Postdoctoral Research Associate at the Centre of Computational Intelligence (CCI), School of Computer Science and Informatics, De Montfort University.

I received a B.Sc in Computer Science at the University of Leicester and an M.Sc in Natural Computation at the University of Birmingham in 2008 and 2009, respectively. I completed a Ph.D in Computer Science at the University of Leicester in 2013.

Author: Michalis Mavrovouniotis
